question:
Which of the following is the correct sequence of the following events of the Indian National Movement?
1.Demise of B.G. Tilak 
2.Passing of Rowlatt Bill as an Act
3.Jallianwala Bagh Massacre
4.Amristar Session of Indian National Congress, 1919
Select the correct answer using the codes given below:
explanation:
The correct sequence of the above events of Indian National Movement is:
Passing of Rowlatt Bill as an Act  - 21 March 1919
Jallianwala Bagh Massacre -  13 April 1919
Amristar Session of Indian National Congress   - 26 Dec 1919
Demise of B.G. Tilak -  1 August 1920
